        public static com.sun.jna.platform.win32.COM.WbemcliUtil.WmiResult<Win32DiskDriveToDiskPartition.DriveToPartitionProperty> queryDriveToPartition​(WmiQueryHandler h)
        Queries the association between disk drive and partition.
